section.title: p:file-tail
section.para: The p:file-tail step returns lines from the end of a text file.
The p:file-tail step returns lines from the end of the document that appears on the source port.

listitem.para: If the count option is positive, the p:file-tail step returns the last count lines
If the count option is zero, the p:file-tail step returns all lines
If the count option is negative, the p:file-tail step returns all lines except the last count lines

section.para: Lines are identified as described in XML, 2.11 End-of-Line Handling
